<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Tanagaar (The Aurulent Eye)](/Deities.aspx?ID=129)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Defend lawful borders, scout or patrol for evil, wait to strike until you have the advantage

**Anathema** Abandon your post, tolerate poaching, torment animals

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Favored Weapon** [Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)

**Domains** [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=6), [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Pass Without Trace](/Spells.aspx?ID=215)

- **3rd**
[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=12)

- **4th**
[Aerial Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=4)
(bird only)

</column>
name: Tanagaar (The Aurulent Eye)
